message:
I'm a big fan of the Lazyness semantics, and well, all I can say is, as an everyday developer, I just miss that on AsyncLazy and on Lazy.

I don't need it all the time, but I do need it. Before Lazy was born, when I used simple private members as value holders, I was able to reset the value pretty easily.

I know I can workaround it for both AsyncLazy and Lazy if I recreate the whole instance, but that would just be easier and more readable.

I didn't see that issue. Thanks!
